ANU.name: Caroline Turner
ANU.colleges: College of Arts and Social Sciences
expertise: Multicultural Intercultural And Cross Cultural Studies
interest: Contemporary Asian and Pacific Art (especially Japan and Indonesia); Museums and museology; Art and Human Rights; Cultural Diplomacy.
ANU.biography: The Australian Government appointed Dr Turner to the Australia-China Council in the 1980s and the Australia-Indonesia Institute in the 1990's.She was made a Member of the Order of Australia (AM) in 2009 for contributions to the visual arts and to the establishment and fostering of cultural relationships in the Asia-Pacific region.
